thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant surprise
thread.title_full: Pleasant surprise - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Espardell
title: Pleasant surprise
text:
Excellent two night stay in this hotel recently. Rooms are contemporary with good decor and efficient bathrooms and the hotel looks very fresh and modern.
Reception staff were friendly and helpful, offered a room upgrade and remembered my name throughout the stay, which is a nice touch.
Good continental breakfast and very reasonable prices in the bar.
Aldgate East tube station is two minutes away.
Would happily return
